text:
What an Excellent Man

A cozy room, family gathered, lighthearted mood.  
Raskolnikov laughs, surprising everyone.  
Raskolnikov: “What an excellent man!”  
Pulcheria: “Yes, excellent, splendid, well-educated!”  
Dounia: “Very much.”  

---  

Raskolnikov grins, teasing his friend.  
Raskolnikov: “Foo!—what a pig you are!”  
Razumihin: “I must go.”  
Pulcheria: “Stay. What’s the time?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov expresses a sudden appreciation for the people around him, revealing a moment of unexpected liveliness amidst his inner turmoil.
